description: This is a modern 'Pods View' dashboard for your Kubernetes cluster(s). Made for kube-prometheus-stack and take advantage of the latest Grafana features. GitHub repository: https://github.com/dotdc/grafana-dashboards-kubernetes

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", image!="", container!=""}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", resource="memory"}) by (pod)

panels.title: Deployment READY Replicas - Up To Date

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)

sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="cpu"}) by (container)

panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory"}) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", resource="memory"}) by (container)

panels.title: Memory Usage / Requests & Limits by container

targets.query: @"$pod" OR org.apache.kafka.streams.errors* OR clojure.lang.ExceptionInfo* OR Caused by:* OR java.lang.* OR core.clj:*

panels.title: CPU usage by pod in $namespace namespace
Total memory  usage by pods in $namespace

title: Kubernetes / Views / Pods
